DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to assess the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of XAF5 Gel when applied to the skin of healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study of XAF5 Gel Applied to Skin of Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Must understand and provide informed consent Skin upon which a reaction would be visible Body weight >= 70 kg Any active skin disease History of skin hypersensitivity Clinically significant abnormality on physical exam, ECG, or laboratory tests Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C
